keywords.indexterm: Edit Menu Add CommentEdit CommentRemove Comment

body.p: Comments are marked in Author mode with a unique name and background for each user.

You can insert and manage comments using the following actions that are available on the toolbar (or in the Review submenu of the contextual menu):
Add Comment Allows you to insert a comment at the cursor position or on a specific selection of content.
Edit Comment Allows you to change an existing comment.
Remove Comment(s) Removes the current comment or all comments found in the selected content.
body.note: When adding or editing a comment, you can use line breaks and will take the line breaks into account when presenting the callout.
body.section:
Review ViewThe Review view is also useful for managing tracked changes and comments. In this view, the edits are presented in a compact form, in the order they appear in the document and each edit is marked with a type-specific icon.
For more information about this view, see the topic.
